description: A Filecoin lotus dashboard for miners

links.title: lotus Farcaster Homepage
links.tooltip: Open Lotus Farcaster homepage on GitHub

targets.expr: green_equipment_power_consumption_va * on() group_left () (green_rack_power_consumption_va / on() sum(green_equipment_power_consumption_va)) / on(equipment)  group_left()  (sum(green_sector_resource) by (equipment))

sort_desc(sum(green_sector_resource{miner_id="$miner_id"} * on(equipment) group_left () (green_equipment_power_consumption_va * on() group_left () (green_rack_power_consumption_va / on() sum(green_equipment_power_consumption_va)) / on(equipment) (sum(green_sector_resource) by (equipment)))) by (sector_id))

# REtourne le nombre de JOB dans l'etat running
label_replace(count by (task) (lotus_miner_worker_job{miner_id="$miner_id",run_wait="0"}),"task","running_$1","task","(.*)")

renameByName.not_running_CommitWait: XXX ALREADY INCLUDED in Waiting Chain
renameByName.not_running_FinalizeReplicaUpdate: XXX ALREADY INCLUDED in GET / FINALIZED
renameByName.not_running_PreCommitWait: XXX ALREADY INCLUDED in Waiting Chain
renameByName.not_running_Removing: XXX No need to display the removing
renameByName.not_running_ReplicaUpdateWait: XXX ALREADY INCLUDED in Waiting Chain
renameByName.not_running_UpdateActivating: XXX Stay here until deadline passed
renameByName.not_running_WaitSeed: XXX ALREADY INCLUDED in Waiting Chain
renameByName.running_seal/v0/fetch: XXX ALREADY INCLUDED in GET / FINALIZED
renameByName.running_seal/v0/finalize: XXX ALREADY INCLUDED in GET / FINALIZED

targets.expr:
# Retourne tout les secteurs qui sont sur les workers mais dans un statut different de Running. On les enrichis avec les infos des workers (Assigned par exemple)
(lotus_miner_sector_state{miner_id="$miner_id", state!~"(Proving|Removed|Available|UpdateActivating)"} * on (sector_id) group_left(job_id,run_wait,job_start_time,task,worker) lotus_miner_worker_job{miner_id="$miner_id", run_wait!="0"})*1

# Calcul do 95 centile sur 30 jours des jobs par Worker et Par task et calcul le temps restant pour chacun des jobs
lotus_miner_worker_job{miner_id="$miner_id",run_wait="0"} - on(worker_host,task) group_left()(quantile(0.95,(max_over_time(lotus_miner_worker_job{miner_id="$miner_id",worker_host!="", run_wait="0"}[30d]) > 1)) by (worker_host,task))

# Calcul do 95 centile sur 30 jours
quantile(0.95,(max_over_time(lotus_miner_worker_job{miner_id="$miner_id", worker_host!="", run_wait="0"}[30d]) > 1)) by (worker_host,task)

# Calcul do 95 centile sur 2 jours
quantile(0.95,(max_over_time(lotus_miner_worker_job{miner_id="$miner_id", worker_host!="", run_wait="0"}[2d]) > 1)) by (worker_host,task)

# REtourne le nombre de JOB dans l'etat running
count by (task) (lotus_miner_worker_job{miner_id="$miner_id",run_wait="0"})

title: Green
